channel.title: CVE Feed for wpdevart -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for wpdevart -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-24387|2024-08-02T10:56:03.241Z -- wpdevart -- organization%20chart
item.description: Auth. (admin+) Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in WPdevart Organization chart plugin <= 1.4.4 versions.

item.title: CVE-2023-46075|2024-08-02T20:37:39.622Z -- wpdevart -- contact%20form%20builder%2C%20contact%20widget
item.description: Unauth. Reflected Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in wpdevart Contact Form Builder, Contact Widget plugin <= 2.1.6 versions.

item.title: CVE-2023-23870|2024-08-02T10:42:26.860Z -- wpdevart -- responsive%20vertical%20icon%20menu
item.description: Auth. (admin+) Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in wpdevart Responsive Vertical Icon Menu plugin <= 1.5.8 versions.

item.title: CVE-2023-24004|2024-08-02T10:49:08.953Z -- wpdevart -- image%20and%20video%20lightbox%2C%20image%20popup
item.description: Auth. (admin+) Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in WPdevart Image and Video Lightbox, Image PopUp plugin <= 2.1.5 versions.

item.title: CVE-2023-24388|2024-08-02T14:46:29.017Z -- wpdevart -- booking%20calendar%2C%20appointment%20booking%20system
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in WpDevArt Booking calendar, Appointment Booking System plugin <= 3.2.3 versions affects plugin forms actions (create, duplicate, edit, delete).

item.title: CVE-2023-24384|2024-08-02T10:56:03.548Z -- wpdevart -- organization%20chart
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in WpDevArt Organization chart <= 1.4.4 versions.

item.title: CVE-2023-45630|2024-08-02T20:21:16.891Z -- wpdevart -- gallery%20%E2%80%93%20image%20and%20video%20gallery%20with%20thumbnails
item.description: Unauth. Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in wpdevart Gallery – Image and Video Gallery with Thumbnails plugin <= 2.0.3 versions.

item.title: CVE-2023-45629|2024-08-02T20:21:16.748Z -- wpdevart -- gallery%20%E2%80%93%20image%20and%20video%20gallery%20with%20thumbnails
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in wpdevart Gallery – Image and Video Gallery with Thumbnails plugin <= 2.0.3 versions.

item.title: CVE-2023-24002|2024-08-02T10:49:08.820Z -- wpdevart -- youtube%20embed%2C%20playlist%20and%20popup%20by%20wpdevart
item.description: Auth. (admin+) Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in WPdevart YouTube Embed, Playlist and Popup by WpDevArt plugin <= 2.6.3 versions.

item.title: CVE-2023-23983|2024-08-02T10:49:08.774Z -- wpdevart -- responsive%20vertical%20icon%20menu
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in wpdevart Responsive Vertical Icon Menu plugin <= 1.5.8 can lead to theme deletion.

item.title: CVE-2023-24373|2024-08-02T10:56:03.888Z -- wpdevart -- booking%20calendar%2C%20appointment%20booking%20system
item.description: External Control of Assumed-Immutable Web Parameter vulnerability in WpDevArt Booking calendar, Appointment Booking System allows Manipulating Hidden Fields.This issue affects Booking calendar, Appointment Booking System: from n/a through 3.2.3.

item.title: CVE-2024-30550|2024-08-02T01:38:59.927Z -- wpdevart -- responsive%20image%20gallery%2C%20gallery%20album
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in wpdevart Responsive Image Gallery, Gallery Album allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Responsive Image Gallery, Gallery Album: from n/a through 2.0.3.

item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in wpdevart Responsive Image Gallery, Gallery Album allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Responsive Image Gallery, Gallery Album: from n/a through 2.0.3.

item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in WpDevArt Responsive Image Gallery, Gallery Album.This issue affects Responsive Image Gallery, Gallery Album: from n/a through 2.0.3.

item.title: CVE-2024-35750|2024-06-10T18:45:58.080Z -- wpdevart -- responsive%20image%20gallery%2C%20gallery%20album
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in wpdevart Responsive Image Gallery, Gallery Album.This issue affects Responsive Image Gallery, Gallery Album: from n/a through 2.0.3.

item.description: Improper Restriction of Excessive Authentication Attempts vulnerability in wpdevart Contact Form Builder, Contact Widget allows Functionality Bypass.This issue affects Contact Form Builder, Contact Widget: from n/a through 2.1.7.

item.description: Authentication Bypass by Spoofing vulnerability in wpdevart Coming soon and Maintenance mode allows Accessing Functionality Not Properly Constrained by ACLs.This issue affects Coming soon and Maintenance mode: from n/a through 3.7.3.
